description: This pathway shows the molecular details about the RNA Polymerase II transcription: the preinitiation complex. These processes are involved in the Tessadori-Bicknell-van Haaften syndrome 3 (TEBINVAD) - for an overview of this syndrome see [WP5575](http://wikipathways.org/instance/WP5575).
title: RNA-polymerase II transcription: the preinitiation complex
